newsitem.title: USA: Calif. State University $13 mln to BA. [CORRECTED 00:37 GMT 2/10]
newsitem.headline: Calif. State University $13 mln to BA. [CORRECTED 00:37 GMT 2/10]

text.p: (Corrects that BA Securities won the bonds. Also supplies BA's true interest cost.
An official on the deal said Merrill's bid did not conform to the issuer's specifications and was rejected.)

BA Securities (corrects from Merrill Lynch & Co) said Tuesday it won $13.13 million California State University, Long Beach, student union revenue bonds, Series B, with a true interest cost of 5.75 percent (corrects from 5.72691 percent).
